newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - ACE*COMM started as buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - ACE*COMM started as buy.

text.p: --Rodman & Renshaw Inc said Thursday it initiated coverage of ACE*COMM Corp, a network software company, with a buy rating.
--It estimates EPS earnings of $0.30 for FY97 and $0.48 for FY98. For the fiscal year ended June 1996, the company earned $0.11 per share.

--Rodman said in a report the market potential for ACE*COMM is strong considering the size of the software market for billing, which it estimates at about $400 million to $500 million in 1996 and growing about 30 to 35 percent a year.
